name: AppLabs Digital Studios
tag_list: apps, mobile, ios, android, blackberry, applabs, ian-atienza, azhar-khan
overview:
We are a specialist mobile and web applications development team offering a full suite of end-to-end services across a multitude of industries and markets. We are also proud to offer our own products that will be available on several carefully chosen distribution channels. Whether it is for Android, iOS, BlackBerry or Web, AppLabs Digital Studios is ready to work with you and be with you in reaching your highest potentials and targets.

AppLabs Digital Studios Inc. was founded by Azhar Khan and Ian Atienza after realizing that more and more people are and will be using Internet connected mobile devices to do both work and play, and that these devices are already playing an integral part of our lives. After several meetings, it was agreed upon that the common goals of a company should be based first on good intentions. The company must make sure all its people will benefit first, and that any partnership must be solidly based on integrity, positivity and focus. Both passionate men agreed, founded and started what is now AppLabs Digital Studios Inc.
